song_name: Dreams of an Absolution (Starry Night Remix)
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Dreams of an Absolution (Starry Night Remix) is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Dreams of an Absolution (Starry Night Remix) has sections analyzed in the following keys: B♭ Minor,  and D♭ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
